pullRequest.body:
---

## TODO
- [x] Add docs
- [ ] Add similar typeclasses for `UniformContinuous` (optional)
- [x] Add instances for
	- [x] `ContinuousMap`
	- [x] `ContinuousMonoidHom`
	- [x] `ContinuousMapZero`
	- [x] `ContinuousLinearMap` (added `ContinuousEvalConst`, we didn't have `continuous_eval` lemma).
	- [x] `ContinuousMultilinearMap`
	- [x] `ContinuousAlternatingMap`
	- [x] non-instances assuming a continuous projection from `F` to `F'`.
- [x] Deprecate type-specific lemmas.

> Why did you put one of the new files under `ContinuousMap` but not the other ?

I don't know. `ContinuousEval` is a generalization of `ContinuousMapClass`, but probably this isn't a good argument. Should we put both of them in `Topology/`? Somewhere else?

> > Why did you put one of the new files under `ContinuousMap` but not the other ?
> 
> I don't know. `ContinuousEval` is a generalization of `ContinuousMapClass`, but probably this isn't a good argument. Should we put both of them in `Topology/`? Somewhere else?

Ah, I see the reasoning, but I would still prefer to have them in the same folder. I think I would put them both under either `Topology/` or `Topology/Hom/`, but feel free to keep the current situation if you want.

In case you forgot about it
This is the additive docstring on the multiplicative statement.
:facepalm:

I think protecting the alias defeats the point of the deprecation mechanism : the goal is that any code using this would still compile and suggest the replacement. But if unprotecting it is too annoying in that case it's not a big deal.
Ah and I guess my comment doesn't apply since the new `continuous_eval` should be a drop-in replacement, right ?
Yes, it's a drop-in replacement (unless someone uses `@continuous_eval` or relies on forcing defeq).

I think it's cleaner to use the embedding just below and [Inducing.topologicalAddGroup](https://leanprover-community.github.io/mathlib4_docs/Mathlib/Topology/Algebra/Group/Basic.html#Inducing.topologicalAddGroup)
Why is this protected but not any of the variants?

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(ContinuousLinearMapWOT): generalize and golf

nodes.body:
> Why did you put one of the new files under `ContinuousMap` but not the other ?

I don't know. `ContinuousEval` is a generalization of `ContinuousMapClass`, but probably this isn't a good argument. Should we put both of them in `Topology/`? Somewhere else?

> > Why did you put one of the new files under `ContinuousMap` but not the other ?
> 
> I don't know. `ContinuousEval` is a generalization of `ContinuousMapClass`, but probably this isn't a good argument. Should we put both of them in `Topology/`? Somewhere else?

Ah, I see the reasoning, but I would still prefer to have them in the same folder. I think I would put them both under either `Topology/` or `Topology/Hom/`, but feel free to keep the current situation if you want.

Thanks!
